name: Galaxy Shooter (briansevera)
description:
Welcome to Galaxy Shooter, a 2D space shooter reminiscent of the classic Galaga arcade game!  Blast enemies in wave after wave then take on the boss!  Collect powerups to improve your chances of defeating the enemy!

Controls for the game are as follows:

  • Arrow Keys = Move
  • Space Bar = Fire
  • Left Shift = Thrusters
  • C = Hold to collect powerups on screen
  • M = Launch homing missile

Shoot the asteroid to begin the game
